en.sc1: Now we will look at the remove method. Here is the linked list before we remove node with value 8.
en.sc2: If node is the head, we call removeFirst().
en.sc3: If the list has only one element, we call removeLast().
en.sc4: Otherwise, we proceed by modifying the prev and next of the nodes surrounding node.
en.sc5: The "next" node's prev field is set to point to node.getPrev().
en.sc6: The "previous" node's next field is set to point to node.getNext().
en.sc7: Since node is no longer pointed to by any other node, it is no longer part of the list.
en.sc8: Finally, decrement number of elements by 1.
